resources.string: Five most amazing buildings of the world
A self-made billionaire came up with these wacky concept buildings â€” including a leg tower
The world is his oyster.Three-hundred well-respected French artists were against the Eiffel Tower in Paris.
Klyukin appears to design buildings without regard to geographical location. Most of his concept art shows the same structures in multiple cities.

He was inspired to design skyscrapers after dreaming one up called the Monaco Comet. In 2014, he purchased a small building in the city-state with aspirations to convert it into the Monaco Comet, though no plants have been set in motion.

Klyukin appears to design buildings without regard to geographical location. Most of his concept art shows the same structures in multiple cities. I realize Venus Tower cannot be built in an Arabic country, he says. However if I like a photo of a city, and I want to show a specific view, I could use Boston and Dubai.

Many of the structures end up as settings in his science fiction works.He has 10 to 50 ideas for new buildings a day, Klyukin tells us. The self-proclaimed introvert says spending lots of time in his head provides inspiration.
